name: The First Martians
description:
This is my submission for Godot Wild Jam 53 ("Assembly Required") and my first time participating in a game jam. The gameplay is extremely simplistic but I hope you enjoy the game.

Browser Support:

Due to Godot 4's use of SharedArrayBuffer, this game can only be played in Chromium-based browser (which means it will not run on Safari or Firefox for example).

  • https://itch.io/t/1332996/cross-origin-isolation-to-unblock-wasm-sharedarraybuff...

Controls:

  • Spacebar
    • advancing the game/dialogue in general
    • hit the nail with the hammer
    • launching the rocket
  • Up/Down arrow keys
    • adjust temperature
  • Mouse
    • click to select and click again to release, used for assembling the rocket
